name: 5th International Conference on Nursing Care and Patient Safety
content: It’s a great pleasure to invite you to a hybrid version of 5th International Conference on Nursing Care and Patient Safety (NCPS2023) schedule from June 14-15, 2023 at Istanbul, Turkey. The theme of the conference is “Sharing solutions, building a healthy world”. It is a premier event for healthcare professionals to come together and discuss the latest research and best practices in patient care. NCPS2023 provides a platform for attendees to learn from expert speakers, network with peers in the nursing field, and gain valuable insights into the current state of nursing care and patient safety. The Nursing Care and Patient Safety 2023 Conference covers a wide range of topics, including patient-centered care, quality improvement, risk management, and technology in nursing. This is an ideal event for nurses, nursing educators, healthcare administrators, and anyone else who is passionate about improving patient care and safety. Join us at the 5th International Conference on Nursing Care and Patient Safety and be a part of shaping the future of the nursing profession. Attendees at NCPS 2023 will have the unique opportunity to meet with leaders of the Nursing and Healthcare profession from around the globe to discuss all the scientific and technical breakthroughs that are changing the landscape of patient care and fulfill their continuing education and professional development requirements. We will keep you regularly updated through our newsletters, email alerts and social media. REGISTER NOW PROGRAM
